tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_preferences (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    favorite_color VARCHAR(255),
    favorite_game VARCHAR(255),
    avatar_url VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE player_preferences (
  player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  username STRING,
  email STRING,
  subscription_level INT,
  theme_color STRING,
  font_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE customization_settings (
  player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  background_image URL,
  notification_sound STRING,
  currency STRING,
  display_language STRING
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerPreferences (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    display_name VARCHAR(50),
    favorite_color VARCHAR(20),
    music_volume INT,
    language VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE GameSettings (
    setting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT REFERENCES PlayerPreferences(player_id),
    sound_effects_volume INT,
    graphics_quality VARCHAR(20),
    control_scheme VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE ThemeCustomization (
    theme_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT REFERENCES PlayerPreferences(player_id),
    theme_color VARCHAR(20),
    font_style VARCHAR(20),
    background_image_url VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE player_preferences (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    country VARCHAR(50),
    theme VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'light'
);

CREATE TABLE customization_settings (
    setting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT REFERENCES player_preferences(player_id),
    background_color VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT '#ffffff',
    font_size INT DEFAULT 12,
    sound_effects BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    notifications BOOLEAN DEFAULT true
);

CREATE TABLE communication_preferences (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT REFERENCES player_preferences(player_id),
    receive_emails BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    receive_sms BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
    push_notifications BOOLEAN DEFAULT true
);
